subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes outpitched Seattle’s ace and Mark Teixeira hit his 37th home run of the season as the Yankees widened their division lead to four games with 16 games to play.
snippet: Phil Hughes outpitched Seattle’s ace and Mark Teixeira hit his 37th home run of the season as the Yankees widened their division lead to four games with 16 games to play.
